ComicInfo.Summary: Reprinted from Ghost Stories (#)... 1: The Blue Cavlier 2: The Method Actor (#5) (also reprinted in Mystery Comics digest # 22) 3: The Walking Bones (#1)4: Split Personality 5: Old Ghost's Home (#1) 6: The Business Of Living 7: Sam, The Skeletton Man
